title: Oakwood Worldwide® receives stamp of approval from ASAP
text:
Oakwood Worldwide® receives stamp of approval from ASAP Oakwood Worldwide® receives stamp of approval from ASAP Details   16:00 Achieves quality accreditation for the second year running Oakwood Worldwide®, the global leader in corporate housing and serviced apartment solutions, has been awarded the Quality Accreditation (QA) Marque by the Association of Serviced Apartment Providers (ASAP) for all its managed properties across London. 
The ASAP is the trade association for the UK serviced apartment sector - defined as furnished apartments available for short or long term stays which provide amenities, housekeeping and a range of services for guests where taxes and utilities are included in the rental price. Supported with the newly introduced QA Marque, the association aims to establish a standard accreditation model to build recognition of the fast-growing industry. To qualify for the QA Marque, Oakwood Worldwide® was subjected to a rigorous review by independent ASAP assessors who also evaluated the overall customer experience provided by Oakwood Worldwide®. The QA marque was subsequently awarded to Oakwood Worldwide® as a result of their exceptionally high standard of service. “We are proud to participate in the ASAP programme and to have achieved the QA Marque with flying colours, underlining the hard work and dedication of our team,” said Debbie Lundon, managing director, EMEA at Oakwood Worldwide®. As we expand our offering in EMEA, we take great care to provide a superb standard of service for our guests, and it’s encouraging to see this is recognised by the industry.” We take great care to provide a superb standard of service as well maximum value for our guests.” ASAP Managing Director James Foice commented: “The success of global players like Oakwood Worldwide® is testament to the increasing profile of the serviced apartment industry internationally. After outstanding growth in our membership in the UK, Ireland and across Europe we are now very excited to be rolling out our quality accreditation in the USA this year, following a successful pilot scheme with key operators this spring. “The QA Marque has an important role to play in helping business travel buyers recognise the standard of quality and service they can expect from serviced apartment providers.” Related articles
